intro:
You are Stefano, a 20 year-old alchemist who wants to find a way to change things into gold. You also work weekends at the village pub to raise funds for your research and pay the bills.

One day you venture forth into the forest and discover a cave, there's a glacier deep inside the cave and you can definitely see an impressive amount of gold behind a thick layer of ice. This is gonna solve all your problems! You would have gold and, although you could just enjoy the gold, you definitely want to spend all the gold trying to learn how to turn things into gold... if that makes sense?

The thing is, you are not able to extract the gold on your own. It takes two people to do the job, hence you must find a buddy and although you have many friends you have to speak to them without letting on, trying to understand how reliable they are, before you can decide who you are gonna to share the secret with.

Any key to start

script: I am good, just started writing a book about alchemy, I want to make my knowledge available for the future generations....you know.....how about you? You are still obsessed with your dream of turning things into gold, aren't you?
you bet it!......I wanted to ask you? What would you do if you had a ridiculous amount of gold at your disposal?
mmmm....that's a good question...I am quite happy about my life and I don't care much about material possessions, I would help my friends first and then I would open an alchemy school in the village.
Oh, I see....your intentions are noble and you are a very good person.
dialogue.endGameStory:
You have decided to tell Magister about your secret, he is a wise man after all and he's been your mentor for ages....you know you can trust him

Magister and you go to the cave to try and dig out the gold....

unfortunately certain people change very quickly when they see too much gold all at once......at the sight of gold, Magister realizes that he wants it for himself, he wants to become the best alchemist in the world, create the elixir of life and rule the world until the 18th century, when Antoine Lavoisier eventually demostrated that alchemy is rubbish.....

as it is the Alchemist stabs you and leave you in the cave, no one is gonna find you there.....he steals the gold and runs away.....

script: Good morning boss, how are you?
I can't complain, Stefano, I have just received a supply of the finest ale in the county, I bet it's gonna be a success this weekend, our customers are gonna love it!

Sounds great! Oh....with regard to this weekend, I might not be able to work because I found.....erm....I feel rough to be honest.....I shall let you know tomorrow whether I am feeling better or not, is that okay?
Well....that's not great, I should ideally know in advance so that I can find some cover? Shall I find you a replacement for this weekend? It's gonna be easier if you can tell me now, Stefano......
options: Tell the Landlord about your secret
Say that you are gonna be working this weekend
Tell the Landlord that you are quitting the job
dialogue.endGameStory:
You tell the Landlord about your secret, he can be abrupt at times but he's a good guy, he is honest and he works really hard......

you then decide to trust him, take him to the cave and show him the gold....

YOU HAVE MADE THE RIGHT DECISION!

The Landlord comes up with a strategy to extract the gold, there's enough to make you both rich forever, you could actually retire today!

The Landlord always wanted to make his own ale and now he can fund the best brewery ever, people will come from anywhere in the region to try his beer!

You can finally focus full time into your research and spend your life trying to turn things into gold, you are not gonna make it, ultimately we all know that you can't change an element into another, come on.....but at least you can leave the dream!

script: Hello Sir, is it possible to check how I have done this quarter, please?
Sure thing, Stefano, that's no trouble......let me see....

Here we are: you are doing 0K at the minute.....your weekend job is providing a stable income but you maybe spent too much on alchemy books and equipment. You would need someone to invest on your research, if you want to take it to the next level.....it probably needs an external "boost", if you see what I mean? Well....unless you can find a gold mine instead......AHAHAHAH
dialogue.endGameStory:
For some reason, you decide to tell the dodgy Accountant about your secret, he's gonna treat you with more respect now that you are rich....you agree that you will see him tomorrow and take him to the cave....

nighttime, the Accountant goes to visit Magister asking for some poison, he wants to kill you and have all the gold for himself, Magister is a bit reluctant but the Accountant manages to convince him that he needs the poison to get rid of some weeds in his garden.....

the Accountant sneaks into your place just before dawn and poisons your milk, he's good with numbers but he's not very clever after all........ten minutes after breakfast you collapse......surprisingly you wake up after a couple of hours, the poison didn't kill you but you've lost your memory and you haven't revealed the actual cave's location to anybody!

You go back to your normal life whilst the Accountant is gonna spend the next couple of months into the forest searching for the cave....
